fields.title: App name
fields.description: Label visible below app icon on homescreen (example: My App)

fields.title: Android Application ID
fields.description: Android Application ID / iOS Bundle ID. Must match old previous version of app. (example: com.example.myapp)

fields.title: IOS Application ID
fields.description: Android Application ID / iOS Bundle ID. Must match old previous version of app. (example: com.example.myapp)

fields.title: Android Version string
fields.description: Version string, visible on AppStore and Play (example: 1.0.0)

fields.title: IOS Version string
fields.description: Version string, visible on AppStore and Play (example: 1.0.0)

fields.title: Android Version code
fields.description: Build number, incremented to indicate a new build (example: 47)

fields.title: IOS Version code
fields.description: Build number, incremented to indicate a new build (example: 47)
